Package org.lwjgl.system.jawt

Contains bindings to the AWT native interface (jawt.h).

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JAWT
    Structure for containing native AWT functions.
    JAWT.Buffer
    An array of JAWT structs.
    JAWTDrawingSurface
    Structure for containing the underlying drawing information of a component.
    JAWTDrawingSurface.Buffer
    An array of JAWTDrawingSurface structs.
    JAWTDrawingSurfaceInfo
    Member documentation
    JAWTDrawingSurfaceInfo.Buffer
    An array of JAWTDrawingSurfaceInfo structs.
    JAWTFunctions
    Bindings to the AWT native interface (jawt.h).
    JAWTFunctions.Functions
    Contains the function pointers loaded from the jawt SharedLibrary.
    JAWTRectangle
    Structure for a native rectangle.
    JAWTRectangle.Buffer
    An array of JAWTRectangle structs.
    JAWTWin32DrawingSurfaceInfo
    Win32-specific declarations for AWT native interface.
    JAWTWin32DrawingSurfaceInfo.Buffer
    An array of JAWTWin32DrawingSurfaceInfo structs.
    JAWTX11DrawingSurfaceInfo
    X11-specific declarations for AWT native interface.
    JAWTX11DrawingSurfaceInfo.Buffer
    An array of JAWTX11DrawingSurfaceInfo structs.

Package org.lwjgl.system.jawt Description

Contains bindings to the AWT native interface (jawt.h).
